Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Hofton Avenue, south of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The Northern City Walls disappear behind the large military building located to the east as Hofton turns to the southeast up ahead. To the west, you can see the intersection with Riverdell Way. On the south are the East Oceancrest City Guard Barracks, where much of the city guard is stationed.
